thread.title: Vanessa Feltz: "I'm engaged the most passionate love affair...
thread.title_full: Vanessa Feltz: "I'm engaged the most passionate love affair...

author: Western Daily Press
title: Vanessa Feltz: "I'm engaged the most passionate love affair...
text:
Game of Thrones breaks record after season five episode gets broadcast in 173 countries 
"The love has flooded in in this complete boundless way. It's hard to describe, but it's a completely unconditional, overwhelming tidal wave of love. All I want to do is make the world a better place so that he can go off and have a good life. 
"I do everything Zeke tells me to do; I am his obedient servant and slave." 
The award, run by restaurant chain Table Table, has been handed out in advance of National Grandparents Day on Sunday – a secular holiday originating in America which has started to catch on in the United Kingdom. 
"We will have a family lunch to celebrate – and as grandma, I had better cook it," Feltz said, adding: "I am so delighted and thrilled to bits that there is an award that acknowledges grandparents and how important we are. 
"We have a great role in expanding our grandchildren's lives and giving them a new layer of love. It's our legacy to the next generation and I'm so grateful."
